ucenterRoleRMenuGetById: select * from t_ucenter_role_r_menu where id=? and del_tag='0'
ucenterRoleRMenuAdd: insert into t_ucenter_role_r_menu(id, ucenter_role_id, ucenter_menu_id, cdate, cuser_id, cuser_name, udate, uuser_id, uuser_name, del_tag) values(null, ?, ?, now(), ?, ?, now(), ?, ?, '0')
ucenterRoleRMenuEdit: update t_ucenter_role_r_menu set ucenter_role_id=?, ucenter_menu_id=?, udate=now(), uuser_id=?, uuser_name=? where id=? and del_tag='0'
ucenterRoleRMenuDel: update t_ucenter_role_r_menu set del_tag='1' where id in (?)
ucenterRoleRMenuListCount: SELECT count(*) tcount FROM t_ucenter_role_r_menu t WHERE t.del_tag='0'
ucenterRoleRMenuListQuery: SELECT * FROM t_ucenter_role_r_menu t WHERE t.del_tag='0'
